titleStmt.title: A verie familiare [and] fruiteful exposition of the .xii. articles of the christian faieth conteined in the co[m]mune crede, called the Apostles Crede made in dialoges, wherein thou maiste learne al thinges necessarie to be beleued. Compiled bi Peter viret a frenche man [and] translated in to englishe
Exposition familiere sur le Symbole des Apostres. English
titleStmt.author: Viret, Pierre, 1511-1571.

publicationStmt.publisher: By [S. Mierdman for] Iohn Day and Wyllyam Seres, dwellynge in Sepulchres Parish at the signe of the Resurrection a litle aboue Holbourne Conduite,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Exposition familiere sur le Symbole des Apostres.
Ostensible printer's names and address from colophon; actual printer's name and conjectured publication date from STC.
Running title reads: An exposition vpo[n] the crede of the Apostles.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
